src:
蘋概股領軍 台股大漲157點續創29年新高
04 Nov 2019, 15:18 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
受惠美股大漲與新台幣升值熱錢湧入，台股4日在蘋概股領軍下開高走高，上漲157.32點，終場收在11556.85點，指數續創29年新高。中央社製圖 108年11月4日
text:
Ping stocks led the Taiwan stocks rose 157 points to a new high of 29 years
04 Nov 2019, 15:18 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
Benefiting from the surge in US stocks and the influx of new Taiwanese currency appreciation, Taiwan stocks opened higher on the 4th, led by Ping stocks, rising 157.32 points, ending at 11556.85 points, the index continued to hit a 29-year high. Central Government Chart November 4, 108
